summary: Craftable Bone Bow and 3 new arrow types.  Weapons made from the Bones of your enemies.
descriptionHtml:
I made this mod to add a little more fun with Predators - The Lost Tribes by D Brown
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24543/?

This mod adds a Bow and arrows made out of the bones of your enemies, which are craftable on any workbench.
This mod also changes the death item drop on pretty much all the NPCs in the game to be able to loot their skeletal system

Bone Bow requires - 1 Leather Strip and 10 Human Skulls
Bone Arrow requires - 1 Left Arm and 1 Right Arm
Blood Bone Arrow requires - 1 Bloody Arm, 1 Bloody Hand, 1 Blood Leg, 1 Bloody Ribcage, and 1 Bone Arrow
Fire Bone Arrow requires - 1 Bloody Leg, 1 Bloody Skull, 1 Bone Arrow, and 1 Torch

*Hint* Most of the Bloody skeleton parts are found on "The good guys" and essential NPCs.
So it is recommended to also install:
Everyone Killable - Skyrim Ultimate Killer by Eden Gallant
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17784/?
(Be sure to save your game before installing Everyone Killable as using that mod can and most likely will cause many quests from being unachievable)

This MOD will most likely conflict with any other mod that changes the death items.
author: Ex0rdium
